feed.title: QuickDrop Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for QuickDrop: v1.4.0
entry.content:
About Page & System Info

Quick Overview: Easily see the current version, database info, Java version, and OS details.
Troubleshooting: Makes reporting issues simpler by showing key environment data.

Hide Admin Dashboard Button

Config Toggle: Decide whether to show or hide the admin dashboard link in the UI.
Security: Even if hidden, admin routes are still protected by authentication.
Cleaner Interface: Great for a more minimal, end-user-focused experience.

Custom Number of Uses for Share Links

Limit Downloads: Specify how many times an unrestricted link can be accessed before itâ€™s disabled.
Expiration Combo: Combine usage limits with an expiration date for extra control.
Better Sharing Control: Perfect for distributing files to a specific group.

Optional Encryption: You can manually choose to disable encryption, even if a password is set, for faster or simpler uploads.

Bug Fixes & Improvements

Chunked Upload Stability: Large files now upload more reliably without hitting buffering issues.
UI/UX Polish: Minor style adjustments for a smoother experience.
General Maintenance: Under-the-hood enhancements to keep QuickDrop fast and stable.

entry.title: New release for QuickDrop: QuickDrop v1.4.1
entry.content: Fixes a problem with database migration script in previous version.

entry.title: New release for QuickDrop: v1.4.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Docker Improvements by @issafram in https://github.com/RoastSlav/quickdrop/pull/32
  • Update Spring Boot to version 3.3.10 (from 3.3.4) by @issafram in https://github.com/RoastSlav/quickdrop/pull/33
  • Fix for the scheduled job for deleting old files not working by @RoastSlav

New Contributors

  • @issafram made their first contribution in https://github.com/RoastSlav/quickdrop/pull/32

Full Changelog: https://github.com/RoastSlav/quickdrop/compare/v1.4.1...v1.4.2

cmd docker pull roastslav/quickdrop:v1.4.2

entry.title: New release for QuickDrop: v1.4.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improved upload and download by @RoastSlav in https://github.com/RoastSlav/quickdrop/pull/34

Full Changelog: https://github.com/RoastSlav/quickdrop/compare/v1.4.2...v1.4.3

entry.title: New release for QuickDrop: v1.4.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Increase request timeout by @RoastSlav in https://github.com/RoastSlav/quickdrop/pull/38
  • Add default home page setting by @RoastSlav in https://github.com/RoastSlav/quickdrop/pull/39

Full Changelog: https://github.com/RoastSlav/quickdrop/compare/v1.4.3...v1.4.5

Download:

docker pull roastslav/quickdrop:v1.4.5

docker pull roastslav/quickdrop:latest
